'''Michael McElhatton''' is an Irish actor and scriptwriter. He won the [[wikipedia:IFTA Award|IFTA Award for Best Actor]] in 2003 for his role in the comedy series ''[[wikipedia:Paths to Freedom|Paths to Freedom]]'', which he also co-wrote.

In ''[[Game of Thrones]]'', McElhatton plays the role of Lord [[Roose Bolton]]. He was confirmed in the role on August 10, 2011.<ref>[http://grrm.livejournal.com/233352.html?thread=14494344#t14494344 George R.R. Martin's blog]</ref> He joined the cast as a guest star in the [[Season 2|second&nbsp;season]] and returned for the [[Season 3|third]], [[Season 4|fourth]], and [[Season 5|fifth]].
